ingredients: egg, rice, soy sauce, green onions, oil
steps: Scramble eggs in a pan with oil. Add cooked rice and soy sauce. Stir-fry until well mixed and heated through. Garnish with chopped green onions.

ingredients: egg, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper
steps: Boil eggs and peel. Cut in half lengthwise and remove yolks. Mix yolks with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper. Spoon or pipe mixture back into egg whites.

ingredients: egg, salt, pepper, butter
steps: Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk with salt and pepper. Melt butter in a pan over medium heat. Pour in eggs and cook, stirring gently, until fully cooked.

ingredients: potato, barbecue seasoning, salt, oil
steps: Slice potato thinly. Toss with barbecue seasoning and salt. Fry until crispy. Drain excess oil.

ingredients: potato, sour cream powder, onion powder, salt, oil
steps: Slice potato thinly. Toss with sour cream powder, onion powder, and salt. Fry until crispy. Drain excess oil.

ingredients: potato, vinegar, salt, oil
steps: Slice potato thinly. Soak in vinegar and salt solution for 30 minutes. Fry until crispy. Drain excess oil.

ingredients: potato, cheddar cheese powder, jalapeno powder, salt, oil
steps: Slice potato thinly. Toss with cheddar cheese powder, jalapeno powder, and salt. Fry until crispy. Drain excess oil.

ingredients: potato, chili powder, lime zest, salt, oil
steps: Slice potato thinly. Toss with chili powder, lime zest, and salt. Fry until crispy. Drain excess oil.

ingredients: potato, sriracha sauce, salt, oil
steps: Slice potato thinly. Toss with sriracha sauce and salt. Fry until crispy. Drain excess oil.

ingredients: potato, ranch seasoning, salt, oil
steps: Slice potato thinly. Toss with ranch seasoning and salt. Fry until crispy. Drain excess oil.

ingredients: potato, buffalo sauce, salt, oil
steps: Slice potato thinly. Toss with buffalo sauce and salt. Fry until crispy. Drain excess oil.

ingredients: potato, truffle oil, salt, oil
steps: Slice potato thinly. Toss with truffle oil and salt. Fry until crispy. Drain excess oil.

ingredients: potato, garlic powder, grated parmesan cheese, salt, oil
steps: Slice potato thinly. Toss with garlic powder, grated parmesan cheese, and salt. Fry until crispy. Drain excess oil.

ingredients: dosa batter, rice, urad dal, fenugreek seeds, salt, water
steps: Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds separately. Grind into a smooth batter. Ferment overnight. Heat a griddle, pour batter, spread thin. Cook until crispy. Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

ingredients: dosa batter, potato, onion, mustard seeds, curry leaves, green chili, turmeric, salt, oil
steps: Boil potato, mash. Sauté mustard seeds, curry leaves, green chili, and onion. Add potato, turmeric, and salt. Spread dosa batter, place potato filling, fold. Cook until crispy. Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

ingredients: dosa batter, rice, urad dal, poha, fenugreek seeds, salt, water
steps: Soak rice, urad dal, poha, and fenugreek seeds separately. Grind into a smooth batter. Ferment overnight. Pour batter onto a hot griddle to form small thick pancakes. Cook until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

ingredients: rice, urad dal, fenugreek seeds, salt, water
steps: Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds separately. Grind into a smooth batter. Ferment overnight. Pour batter into idli molds. Steam until cooked. Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

ingredients: urad dal, green chili, ginger, curry leaves, onion, salt, oil
steps: Soak urad dal. Grind into a smooth batter with green chili and ginger. Add curry leaves, onion, and salt. Shape into small discs, deep fry until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

ingredients: semolina, oil, mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, green chili, curry leaves, onion, ginger, carrot, peas, salt, water
steps: Dry roast semolina until golden. Sauté mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, green chili, curry leaves, onion, and ginger. Add vegetables, water, and salt. Cook until water is absorbed. Serve hot.

ingredients: rice, split moong dal, ginger, black pepper, cumin seeds, curry leaves, cashews, ghee, salt, water
steps: Dry roast rice and moong dal until aromatic. Cook with water, ginger, and salt until soft. Temper with ghee, black pepper, cumin seeds, curry leaves, and cashews. Serve hot.

ingredients: rice, toor dal, tamarind, mixed vegetables, coconut, red chili, coriander seeds, chana dal, urad dal, fenugreek seeds, mustard seeds, curry leaves, cinnamon, cloves, turmeric, jaggery, ghee, salt, water
steps: Cook rice and toor dal until soft. Cook tamarind extract, mixed vegetables, and spices until tender. Mix with cooked rice and dal. Temper with spices and ghee. Serve hot.

ingredients: tomato, tamarind, garlic, curry leaves, green chili, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, black pepper, turmeric, coriander leaves, salt, water
steps: Cook tomato, tamarind, garlic, curry leaves, green chili, and spices until soft. Add water, bring to a boil. Garnish with coriander leaves. Serve hot as a soup or with rice.

ingredients: rice, toor dal, chana dal, urad dal, red chili, ginger, curry leaves, asafoetida, salt, oil
steps: Soak rice and dals separately. Grind into a coarse batter with red chili and ginger. Add curry leaves, asafoetida, and salt. Spread on a hot griddle, cook until crispy. Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

ingredients: all-purpose flour, yogurt, water, sugar, saffron, cardamom, oil
steps: Prepare batter with all-purpose flour and yogurt. Ferment. Make a sugar syrup with water, sugar, saffron, and cardamom. Pipe batter into hot oil in circular motions, fry until crispy. Soak in sugar syrup.

ingredients: milk, lemon juice, sugar, saffron, cardamom, almonds, pistachios
steps: Boil milk, add lemon juice to curdle. Strain and collect chenna. Knead chenna, shape into balls, flatten. Boil in sugar syrup. Serve cold, garnished with saffron, cardamom, almonds, and pistachios.

ingredients: milk powder, all-purpose flour, yogurt, ghee, sugar, water, cardamom, saffron, rose water
steps: Mix milk powder, all-purpose flour, yogurt, and ghee to make a dough. Shape into balls. Fry until golden. Make sugar syrup with water, sugar, cardamom, saffron, and rose water. Soak fried balls in syrup.

ingredients: cashews, sugar, water, ghee
steps: Grind cashews into a fine powder. Cook with sugar and water until thickened. Spread on a greased surface, cool, cut into diamond shapes.

ingredients: milk powder, condensed milk, ghee, sugar, cardamom, pistachios
steps: Cook milk powder, condensed milk, ghee, and sugar until thickened. Add cardamom, spread in a greased tray, garnish with pistachios. Cool, cut into squares.

ingredients: milk, sugar, cardamom, saffron, almonds, pistachios, chenna
steps: Boil milk, add sugar, cardamom, saffron, almonds, and pistachios. Shape chenna into balls, flatten. Boil in milk, chill, serve cold.

ingredients: carrots, milk, sugar, ghee, cardamom, almonds, pistachios
steps: Grate carrots, cook with milk until thickened. Add sugar, ghee, cardamom, cook until ghee separates. Garnish with almonds and pistachios.

ingredients: milk, sugar, saffron, cardamom, almonds, pistachios
steps: Boil milk, reduce until thickened. Add sugar, saffron, cardamom, almonds, and pistachios. Chill, serve cold.

ingredients: paneer, sugar, cardamom, saffron, pistachios
steps: Knead paneer with sugar, cardamom, saffron. Shape into balls, flatten. Garnish with pistachios.

ingredients: rice flour, jaggery, coconut, cardamom, ghee
steps: Make dough with rice flour and water.  Cook jaggery, coconut, cardamom until thickened.  Fill dough with mixture, shape into cones.  Steam until cooked.

ingredients: samosa, yogurt, tamarind, mint, cilantro, green chili, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, salt, sev
steps: Break samosa into pieces.  Top with yogurt, tamarind chutney, and spices.  Garnish with sev, mint, and cilantro.

ingredients: kachori, yogurt, tamarind, mint, cilantro, green chili, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, salt, sev
steps: Break kachori into pieces.  Top with yogurt, tamarind chutney, and spices.  Garnish with sev, mint, and cilantro.

ingredients: semolina, wheat flour, water, tamarind, mint, cilantro, green chili, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, boiled potato, chickpeas, salt, oil
steps: Prepare dough with semolina and wheat flour.  Roll out small puris, deep fry until crispy.  Fill with potato, chickpeas, tamarind water, and spices.  Serve immediately.

ingredients: semolina, wheat flour, water, yogurt, tamarind, mint, cilantro, green chili, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, boiled potato, chickpeas, salt, sev
steps: Prepare dough with semolina and wheat flour.  Roll out small puris, deep fry until crispy.  Fill with potato, chickpeas, yogurt, tamarind chutney, and spices.  Top with sev and serve.

ingredients: semolina, wheat flour, water, boiled potato, chickpeas, onion, tomato, cilantro, green chili, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, salt, sev
steps: Prepare dough with semolina and wheat flour.  Roll out small puris, deep fry until crispy.  Crush and mix with potato, chickpeas, onion, tomato, cilantro, and spices.  Top with sev and serve.

ingredients: semolina, wheat flour, water, boiled potato, onion, tomato, cilantro, green chili, tamarind, mint, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, salt, sev
steps: Prepare dough with semolina and wheat flour.  Roll out small puris, deep fry until crispy.  Top with potato, onion, tomato, cilantro, tamarind chutney, and spices.  Garnish with sev and serve.

ingredients: puffed rice, onion, tomato, boiled potato, cilantro, green chili, tamarind, mint, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, salt, sev
steps: Mix puffed rice with chopped onion, tomato, potato, cilantro, green chili, tamarind chutney, and spices.  Garnish with sev and serve.

ingredients: urad dal, moong dal, yogurt, tamarind, mint, cilantro, green chili, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, salt
steps: Soak dal, grind, and fry into balls.  Soak in water, drain, and cover with yogurt, tamarind chutney, and spices.  Garnish with sev and serve.

ingredients: potato, white peas, onion, tomato, cilantro, green chili, tamarind, mint, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, salt, oil
steps: Boil potato and white peas.  Mash potato, shape into patties, fry until golden.  Serve with ragda (white peas curry), topped with onion, tomato, cilantro, tamarind chutney, and spices.

ingredients: chickpeas, onion, tomato, cilantro, green chili, tamarind, mint, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, salt, oil
steps: Cook chickpeas until soft.  Mix with chopped onion, tomato, cilantro, green chili, tamarind chutney, and spices.  Serve as a chaat.

ingredients: potato, onion, tomato, cilantro, green chili, tamarind, mint, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, salt, oil
steps: Boil potato, cube.  Sauté with chopped onion, tomato, cilantro, green chili, tamarind chutney, and spices.  Serve hot as a chaat.

ingredients: moong dal, wheat flour, oil, yogurt, tamarind, mint, cilantro, green chili, chaat masala, cumin powder, black salt, salt, sev
steps: Make dough with moong dal and wheat flour.  Shape into balls, deep fry until golden.  Top with yogurt, tamarind chutney, and spices.  Garnish with sev and serve.

ingredients: potato, cauliflower, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, chili powder, salt, garam masala
steps: Sauté onion, ginger, garlic in oil.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add potato and cauliflower, cook until tender.

ingredients: potato, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, green chili, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, salt, oil
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, and green chili in oil.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add potato, cook until tender.

ingredients: potato, olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, pepper
steps: Cut potatoes into wedges.  Toss with olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.  Bake until crispy.

ingredients: potato, mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, onion, celery, salt, pepper
steps: Boil potatoes, cube.  Mix with mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, onion, celery, salt, and pepper.

ingredients: potato, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, milk, butter, salt, pepper
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in butter.  Add potato and broth, simmer until potato is soft.  Blend until smooth, add milk, salt, and pepper.

ingredients: potato, whole wheat flour, ghee, green chili, ginger, coriander leaves, salt
steps: Boil potato, mash.  Mix with spices.  Stuff dough with potato mixture.  Cook on griddle with ghee.

ingredients: potato, onion, egg, flour, salt, pepper, oil
steps: Grate potato and onion.  Mix with egg, flour, salt, and pepper.  Fry in oil until golden brown.

ingredients: potato, onion, garlic, ginger, green chili, cumin seeds, mustard seeds, turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, salt, oil
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, and green chili in oil.  Add spices, cook until fragrant.  Add potato, cook until tender.

ingredients: potato, oil, salt
steps: Slice potatoes thinly.  Fry in oil until crispy.  Season with salt.

ingredients: potato, bread crumbs, egg, onion, garlic, parsley, salt, pepper, oil
steps: Boil potato, mash.  Mix with onion, garlic, parsley, salt, and pepper.  Shape into croquettes, dip in egg, coat with bread crumbs.  Fry until golden brown.

ingredients: paneer, cream, tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, cashew nuts, yogurt, green chili, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, garam masala, salt
steps: Sauté onion, ginger, garlic, and cashew nuts.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add paneer, cream, and yogurt, simmer.

ingredients: paneer, tomato, onion, capsicum, garlic, ginger, green chili, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, garam masala, salt, oil
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, and capsicum.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add paneer, cook until done.

ingredients: paneer, yogurt, tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, green chili, cashew nuts, garam masala, turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, cumin, salt, cream, butter
steps: Marinate paneer with yogurt and spices.  Grill paneer.  Sauté onion, ginger, garlic, and cashew nuts.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add grilled paneer, cream, and butter, simmer.

ingredients: paneer, onion, tomato, capsicum, garlic, ginger, green chili, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, salt, oil
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, capsicum, and green chili.  Add tomato and spices, cook until soft.  Add crumbled paneer, cook until combined.

ingredients: paneer, rice, onion, tomato, green chili, garlic, ginger, mint leaves, coriander leaves, turmeric, garam masala, salt, oil
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, and green chili.  Add tomato and spices, cook until soft.  Add rice, water, and paneer, cook until done.

ingredients: paneer, yogurt, tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, cashew nuts, coconut, green chili, garam masala, turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, cumin, salt, oil
steps: Sauté onion, ginger, garlic, and cashew nuts.  Add tomato, coconut, and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add yogurt and paneer, simmer.

ingredients: paneer, chickpea flour, rice flour, baking soda, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, salt, water, oil
steps: Make batter with chickpea flour, rice flour, and spices.  Dip paneer in batter.  Fry until golden brown.

ingredients: paneer, tomato, cream, butter, onion, ginger, garlic, cashew nuts, yogurt, green chili, garam masala, turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, cumin, salt
steps: Sauté onion, ginger, garlic, and cashew nuts.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add cream, butter, yogurt, and paneer, simmer.

ingredients: rice, lemon, mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, green chili, curry leaves, turmeric, salt, oil
steps: Cook rice.  Sauté mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, green chili, and curry leaves in oil.  Add turmeric, salt, and lemon juice.  Mix with rice.

ingredients: rice, mixed vegetables, yogurt, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, green chili, cumin, coriander powder, garam masala, saffron, salt, ghee
steps: Marinate vegetables with yogurt and spices.  Cook rice with saffron.  Layer rice and vegetables, cook on low heat.

ingredients: rice, tomato, onion, garlic, ginger, green chili, mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, curry leaves, turmeric, salt, oil
steps: Sauté mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, green chili, curry leaves, onion, garlic, and ginger in oil.  Add tomato and spices.  Mix with rice.

ingredients: rice, coconut, mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, green chili, curry leaves, turmeric, salt, oil
steps: Sauté mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, green chili, and curry leaves in oil.  Add coconut, turmeric, and salt.  Mix with rice.

ingredients: rice, mixed vegetables, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, green chili, cumin, coriander powder, garam masala, salt, oil
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, and green chili in oil.  Add tomato and spices.  Mix with rice and vegetables.

ingredients: rice, yogurt, mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, green chili, curry leaves, ginger, salt, oil
steps: Cook rice.  Mix with yogurt, salt, and ginger.  Sauté mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, green chili, and curry leaves in oil.  Mix with rice.

ingredients: rice, tamarind, mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, red chili, fenugreek seeds, curry leaves, turmeric, salt, oil
steps: Cook rice.  Sauté mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, red chili, fenugreek seeds, and curry leaves in oil.  Add tamarind paste, turmeric, and salt.  Mix with rice.

ingredients: rice, mushrooms, yogurt, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, green chili, cumin, coriander powder, garam masala, saffron, salt, ghee
steps: Marinate mushrooms with yogurt and spices.  Cook rice with saffron.  Layer rice and mushrooms, cook on low heat.

ingredients: pasta, tomato sauce, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper
steps: Cook pasta.  Prepare sauce with garlic and olive oil.  Mix pasta with sauce.  Add salt and pepper to taste.

ingredients: chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, cucumber, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper
steps: Cook and shred chicken breast.  Chop lettuce, tomato, and cucumber.  Mix all ingredients.  Add olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper to taste.

ingredients: egg, milk, cheese, salt, pepper, butter
steps: Beat eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.  Melt butter in a pan.  Pour the egg mixture into the pan.  Add cheese.  Cook until done.

ingredients: banana, strawberries, yogurt, honey, milk
steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender.  Blend until smooth.

ingredients: broccoli, carrot, bell pepper, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, olive oil
steps: Chop vegetables.  Stir fry garlic and ginger in olive oil.  Add vegetables and stir fry.  Add soy sauce and cook until vegetables are tender.

ingredients: pasta, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper
steps: Cook pasta.  Sauté garlic in olive oil.  Mix pasta with garlic and olive oil.  Add salt and pepper to taste.

ingredients: tomato, cucumber, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, feta cheese, olives
steps: Chop tomato and cucumber.  Mix all ingredients.  Add olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper to taste.  Add feta cheese and olives.

ingredients: egg, milk, cheese, salt, pepper, butter
steps: Beat eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.  Melt butter in a pan.  Pour the egg mixture into the pan.  Add cheese.  Cook until done.

ingredients: chickpeas, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, cumin, coriander powder, garam masala, salt, turmeric, chili powder
steps: Soak chickpeas overnight.  Cook chickpeas until tender.  Sauté onion, ginger, garlic in oil.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add chickpeas and simmer.

ingredients: paneer, butter, tomato, cream, onion, ginger, garlic, chili powder, turmeric, garam masala, salt
steps: Sauté onion, ginger, garlic in butter.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add paneer and cream, simmer.

ingredients: eggplant, tomato, onion, garlic, ginger, green chili, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, salt, garam masala, oil
steps: Roast eggplant, remove skin, and mash.  Sauté onion, ginger, garlic in oil.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add mashed eggplant, cook for 10 minutes.

ingredients: rice, chicken, yogurt, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, green chili, cumin, coriander powder, garam masala, saffron, salt, ghee
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.  Cook rice with saffron.  Layer rice and chicken, cook on low heat.

ingredients: chicken, butter, tomato, cream, onion, garlic, ginger, chili powder, turmeric, garam masala, salt
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.  Grill chicken.  Make sauce with butter, onion, garlic, tomato, and spices.  Add chicken and cream, simmer.

ingredients: black lentils, kidney beans, tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, butter, cream, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, chili powder, salt
steps: Soak lentils and beans overnight.  Cook lentils and beans until tender.  Sauté onion, ginger, garlic in butter.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add lentils and beans, simmer with cream.

ingredients: red lentils, tomato, onion, garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, chili powder, salt, ghee
steps: Cook lentils until tender.  Sauté onion, ginger, garlic in ghee.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add lentils, simmer.

ingredients: spinach, paneer, tomato, onion, garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, chili powder, salt, cream
steps: Blanch spinach and puree.  Sauté onion, ginger, garlic in oil.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add spinach puree and paneer, simmer with cream.

ingredients: lamb, yogurt, tomato, onion, garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, salt, ghee
steps: Marinate lamb with yogurt and spices.  Sauté onion, ginger, garlic in ghee.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add lamb, simmer until tender.

ingredients: mustard greens, spinach, onion, garlic, ginger, green chili, cornmeal, ghee, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, salt
steps: Cook greens until tender, puree.  Sauté onion, ginger, garlic in ghee.  Add spices and puree, simmer with cornmeal.
column5: potato, peas, cumin, coriander powder, garam masala, turmeric, chili powder, salt, flour, oil, water
column6: Make dough with flour, water, and oil.  Cook filling with potato, peas, and spices.  Fill dough with filling, fry until golden.

ingredients: chicken, yogurt, garlic, ginger, lemon juice, chili powder, turmeric, garam masala, cumin, salt
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.  Grill chicken until cooked.

ingredients: mixed vegetables, tomato, onion, garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander powder, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, salt, oil
steps: Sauté onion, ginger, garlic in oil.  Add tomato and spices, cook until oil separates.  Add vegetables, cook until tender.

ingredients: potato, garlic, green chili, turmeric, salt, flour, water, oil, bread rolls
steps: Make dough with flour and water.  Cook filling with potato and spices.  Fill dough with filling, fry until golden.  Serve in bread rolls.

ingredients: potato, peas, cumin, coriander powder, garam masala, turmeric, chili powder, salt, flour, oil, water
steps: Make dough with flour, water, and oil.  Cook filling with potato, peas, and spices.  Fill dough with filling, fry until golden.
